test:
import numpy as np
mp = MixedPrecision(loss_scale=1024.0)
weights = np.array([0.5, -0.3], dtype=np.float32)
inputs = np.array([[1.0, 2.0], [3.0, 4.0]], dtype=np.float32)
targets = np.array([1.0, 0.0], dtype=np.float32)
loss = mp.forward(weights, inputs, targets)
print(f"Loss: {loss:.4f}")
print(f"Loss dtype: {type(loss).__name__}")
grads = np.array([512.0, -256.0], dtype=np.float32)
result = mp.backward(grads)
print(f"Gradients: {result}")
print(f"Grad dtype: {result.dtype}")
expected_output:
Loss: 665.0000
Loss dtype: float
Gradients: [0.5 -0.25]
Grad dtype: float32

import numpy as np
mp = MixedPrecision(loss_scale=512.0)
weights = np.array([1.0, 0.5], dtype=np.float64)
inputs = np.array([[2.0, 1.0]], dtype=np.float64)
targets = np.array([3.0], dtype=np.float64)
loss = mp.forward(weights, inputs, targets)
print(f"Loss: {loss:.1f}")
print(f"Loss dtype: {type(loss).__name__}")
grads = np.array([1024.0, 512.0], dtype=np.float16)
result = mp.backward(grads)
print(f"Gradients: [{result[0]:.0f} {result[1]:.0f}]")
print(f"Grad dtype: {result.dtype}")
expected_output:
Loss: 128.0
Loss dtype: float
Gradients: [2 1]
Grad dtype: float32
